name: OR_CASE_RAD_NEED_TXT
description: This table contains free-text documentation regarding radiology special needs.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RAD_NEEDS_TXT
columns.description: This free-text item is used to document special radiology requirements for this case.
